title: Scarface narow serif
content:
Hi,

Did a search on typophile and found en entry mentioning that the Scarface logo was done in Palatino… not sure if anyone would know what cut of it it might be, as i can’t find any condensed versions of it… or has it been handcrafted. if so is there an alternative?

thanks in advance  
anders

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [scarface.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20061116104207/http:/typophile.com/files/scarface.jpg) | 71.57 KB |
author: creativep

comments.content:
I do not believe your picture shows a Palatino.

This is a Palatino bold:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/1_6466.jpg)

Georg

i wasn’t convinced either. does anyone know what it might be?

anders
